script.title: range.slax
script.author: jayw
script.synopsis: To allow the user to issue select attributes on a range of interfaces on EX and MX.
script.description: This script uses the "range" macro for configuring a range of interfaces (DPC and PIC for EX, DPC for MX). If the vlan specified to be placed on the interfaces does not exist in "vlans", the vlan will be created and the "vlan-id" will be added.
